EmailTemplate.name: Follow up from MBO Partners (1320179153.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: Follow up from MBO Partners (1320179153.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
1024x768 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Gary,
It was a pleasure speaking with you earlier today! I asked around and we do not have an official enterprise relationship with BAE Systems, we have had consultants work with BAE through MBO in the past so we may be able to use the contract in the system but I am going to go in with the assumption that we cannot until I speak with your contact at BAE. Often there are different divisions within companies and the contracts we have are not always able to be used based on what division it was negotiated with. I will be your point of contact moving forward and would like to have a more in depth conversation with you before reaching out to BAE to go over the MBO Business model so I have attached a link to my calendar below for you to schedule a convenient time for us to speak.
https://my.timedriver.com/9TGRK
I have also included some additional information about MBO below for your review before we speak.
http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Partners_Introduction.pdf
http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Partners_vs_1099_Comparison.pdf
I look forward to speaking with you soon!
Have a great evening,
Nicolette
___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Business Manager MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6281 f: 703.793.6456 e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
